name: SafeBase
headline: Trust Center platform that scales customer security reviews
description:
Trust Center Platform

SafeBase Trust Center enables Security teams to proactively share and automate access to security, compliance, and privacy information/ complete security questionnaires.

founders.name: Al Yang, Founder
founders.description: Father of two - lives in the Bay - enjoys company building and golfing. Started SafeBase to help companies share their security and compliance posture and automate access to sensitive information -- a pain he dealt with in his last company (Medumo, acquired by Philips Health).

founders.name: Adar Arnon, Founder
founders.description:
Former R&D group leader in an elite technology unit in the Intelligence Directorate of the IDF. Specialized in Cybersecurity and OS architecture. Graduated from the joint-degree MS/MBA program at Harvard.
I enjoy building stuff, and I enjoy breaking stuff even more. I've had years of varied experiences in the intersection of cybersecurity & web infrastructure, from designing secure networking protocols, to architecting operating system drivers, and managing a reverse-engineering team.

# ‍AI-powered Trust Center to share information and answer questionnaires
Trust Center + AI Questionnaire Assistance‍Build customer trust upfront with secure Trust Center access to security and compliance information. Generate accurate, real-time questionnaire responses with AI, boost team productivity, and prove security ROI — all from the SafeBase Trust Center platform.
[Book a demo](https://www.safebase.io/</schedule>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/66ce68295977cd0148fbdc62_Homepage%20hero%20-%20no%20background.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/6741c5f2b1bdc6e433014a76_Reduce%20time%20spent%20on%20security%20questionnaire%20review%20by%2080%25%20and%20more%20with%20SafeBase.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65e23e60e8df349868592678_Visibility%2002.png)
### Reduce time spent on security questionnaires by 80% or more
**AI Questionnaire Assistance** rapidly processes large volumes of complex security questionnaires, leveraging your existing content to generate swift, accurate responses. [**LEARN MORE**](https://www.safebase.io/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/6741d997d3ce84922e32a87d_SafeBase%20AI%20Powered%20Trust%20Center%20and%20Questionnaire%20Assistance.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/666caa3efe6b4c8e86311e6c_Partnership%20\(1\).png)
### Build Customer Trust
Proactively share your security posture with prospects and customers and with a highly scalable **Trust Center**. Custom rules engines, permission profiles, and advanced search capabilities allow secure, self-serve access to commonly asked security questions to simplify the review process. [**LEARN MORE**](https://www.safebase.io/<#>)
![Integrate into the flow of work with robust integrations from SafeBase. Integrate into GTM tools like Slack, Teams, Jira, and Salesforce as well as major TPRMs, Docusign, Ironclad and more with SafeBase.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/6741e246ab283f958a3367ba_Robust%20Integrations%20with%20SafeBase.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/662f0fc5c91cc7a39f05204f_Trust%20Center%20examples.png)
### Integrate into the flow of work to boost productivity
Manage Trust Center tasks with **integrations** for Slack, Teams and Jira, streamline DocuSign and Ironclad NDA workflows, and embed Intercom chat tools within your Trust Center. Plus integrate into major TPRMs, Salesforce, and other GTM workflow tools to drive efficiency.[**LEARN MORE**](https://www.safebase.io/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/6741e58a9ad20d03312952d7_SafeBase%20offers%20robust%20analytics%20dashboards%20to%20prove%20security%20program%20ROI.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65e10a6c1d340a7bd5afef04_Industry%20acceleration.png)
### Help close deals faster and prove security's ROI
Analytics dashboards offer granular views of security enabled revenue, connecting your team's efforts to ARR, pipeline and deal velocity. Keep track of buyer engagement metrics like access requests, account activity, and document interactions to prove impact and optimize.[**LEARN MORE**](https://www.safebase.io/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/657374b3c88dc905c3c6d6b6_img-1%402x.png)
## Calculate ROI of AI-powered security reviews
Download our ROI calculator to see time and cost savings of streamlined security and questionnaire reviews.
[See your savings![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653aafdfb322ad22b5d0ceea/65495c213aaf8e7a1bd35d83_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)](https://www.safebase.io/<https:/safebase.io/resources/guide-best-practices>)

## Best Practices for Building — and Keeping — Customer Trust
Strategic insights from 800+ leading companies on driving security's impact. Uncover blind spots hindering your security review process, strategies to showcase Security as a business driver, and 5 foundational elements every Trust Center needs. 
[Download the Guide![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653aafdfb322ad22b5d0ceea/65495c213aaf8e7a1bd35d83_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)](https://www.safebase.io/<https:/safebase.io/resources/guide-best-practices>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65734be51ec919ee59ea2264_Brian%20Tobin.jpeg)](https://www.safebase.io/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/656e0b2554671f245da7d92f_634f0dd421b7f486933b8e25_Chris-Castaldo-Crossbeam-SafeBase.webp)](https://www.safebase.io/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/657b5c8f08a1ebf340d1d201_Mike_Britton.png)](https://www.safebase.io/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/662937f57fca06707c4695ad_Arianna%20Willett_ngrok_Headshot.jpeg)](https://www.safebase.io/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65734ff26c2cc9cc2084e690_Jake%20Yount.jpeg)](https://www.safebase.io/<#>)
“A zero-friction, more open program helps us amplify our commitment to security and privacy. But, it also allows us to keep up with the immense demand from our large and small customers.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65734be51ec919ee59ea2264_Brian%20Tobin.jpeg)
Brian Tobin
Security Technical Program Manager
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65735accd02e43f24b52701a_63fd3ada61b9b6d7ff80d994_asana-logo-p-500.png)
“Besides saving myself and our sales team time, it has increased customer confidence in our platform and shows one of our core values very transparently — Trust is Our Business. Our Security Portal puts that on display for all to see.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/656e0b2554671f245da7d92f_634f0dd421b7f486933b8e25_Chris-Castaldo-Crossbeam-SafeBase.webp)
Chris Castaldo
CISO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/656e0aa58b218cc108ac06cc_kwfoo8fo8jps9bu6cxpok87cdig1.png)
“With a bifurcated security review process, you’re taking a chance that the documentation that’s shared is out of date. Someone might not know the right answer. Customer trust is hard to obtain and easy to lose. We’re not interested in walking things back.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/657b5c8f08a1ebf340d1d201_Mike_Britton.png)
Mike Britton
CISO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65660d28c49c3d524c4b21a2_abnormal%20alt.png)
“It makes my life so much easier…A process that used to take weeks now can be completed in a matter of minutes, and I usually don’t even have to get involved. Now I can focus on having the most strategic conversations, rather than getting into the weeds of every deal.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/662937f57fca06707c4695ad_Arianna%20Willett_ngrok_Headshot.jpeg)
Arianna Willet
Senior Director of Security Risk & Trust
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/662723051c21a90b1c536636_ngrok.png)
“Beyond a shadow of a doubt, SafeBase streamlines our process. Every customer has to go through some type of security review… SafeBase has completely streamlined and simplified that process. There’s an inherent benefit to our acceleration.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65734ff26c2cc9cc2084e690_Jake%20Yount.jpeg)
Jake Yount
VP of North America Sales
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65660d28c49c3d524c4b21a2_abnormal%20alt.png)

Generate accurate, real-time questionnaire responses with AI, boost team productivity, and prove security ROI — all from the SafeBase Trust Center platform.

### Reduce time spent on security questionnaires by 80% or more
**AI Questionnaire Assistance** rapidly processes large volumes of complex security questionnaires, leveraging your existing content to generate swift, accurate responses. **LEARN MORE**⟨3⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/6741d997d3ce84922e32a87d_SafeBase%20AI%20Powered%20Trust%20Center%20and%20Questionnaire%20Assistance.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/666caa3efe6b4c8e86311e6c_Partnership%20\(1\).png)
### Build Customer Trust
Proactively share your security posture with prospects and customers and with a highly scalable **Trust Center**. Custom rules engines, permission profiles, and advanced search capabilities allow secure, self-serve access to commonly asked security questions to simplify the review process. **LEARN MORE**⟨3⟩
![Integrate into the flow of work with robust integrations from SafeBase. Integrate into GTM tools like Slack, Teams, Jira, and Salesforce as well as major TPRMs, Docusign, Ironclad and more with SafeBase.⟨44⟩]
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/662f0fc5c91cc7a39f05204f_Trust%20Center%20examples.png)
### Integrate into the flow of work to boost productivity
Manage Trust Center tasks with **integrations** for Slack, Teams and Jira, streamline DocuSign and Ironclad NDA workflows, and embed Intercom chat tools within your Trust Center. Plus integrate into major TPRMs, Salesforce, and other GTM workflow tools to drive efficiency.**LEARN MORE**⟨3⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/6741e58a9ad20d03312952d7_SafeBase%20offers%20robust%20analytics%20dashboards%20to%20prove%20security%20program%20ROI.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/65e10a6c1d340a7bd5afef04_Industry%20acceleration.png)
### Help close deals faster and prove security's ROI
Analytics dashboards offer granular views of security enabled revenue, connecting your team's efforts to ARR, pipeline and deal velocity. Keep track of buyer engagement metrics like access requests, account activity, and document interactions to prove impact and optimize.**LEARN MORE**⟨3⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65397ce059ca157da9e02a14/657374b3c88dc905c3c6d6b6_img-1%402x.png)

generated_description:
**SafeBase: A Trust Center for Modern Businesses**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Summer Batch (S20), SafeBase is revolutionizing how organizations handle customer security reviews. Based in San Francisco, this SaaS company has quickly grown to a team of around 60 employees.

**What Does SafeBase Do?**
At its core, SafeBase operates as a Trust Center platform—a dedicated space where security teams can share crucial security, compliance, and privacy information with customers. The idea is simple yet powerful: automate and streamline the security review process, making it significantly more efficient. SafeBase allows companies to effortlessly respond to security questionnaires and showcases their security posture directly to clients.

Key features include:
- **AI Questionnaire Assistance**: This tool helps teams quickly and accurately respond to complex security questionnaires, significantly cutting down on turnaround time.
- **Integrations**: SafeBase works seamlessly with tools that teams use daily, including Salesforce, Slack, and various document management systems. This integration helps bring security processes right into the workflow, enhancing productivity.
- **Analytics**: Users gain insights into their security programs and can track engagement metrics with clients, demonstrating the tangible ROI of their security efforts.

**SafeBase’s Mission**
The mission of SafeBase is clear: they aim to build a scalable platform that simplifies security reviews and enhances customer trust. In a landscape where data security and compliance are paramount, SafeBase positions itself as a trusted partner for businesses aiming to strengthen their security posture.

**The Team Behind SafeBase**
The company is co-led by Dalton Caldwell, a notable group partner at Y Combinator. With a focus on productivity and cybersecurity, SafeBase is heavily invested in creating solutions that empower both security teams and their customers.

**The Big Picture**
In an environment where customers increasingly demand transparency and security, SafeBase not only meets these needs but also facilitates stronger business relationships through trust. With a growing list of high-profile clients and a reputation for efficiency, SafeBase is setting a new standard for how businesses navigate security reviews.

For more information, you can visit their website at [SafeBase.io](https://www.safebase.io). 

In an age where security cannot be an afterthought, companies that leverage SafeBase get ahead in building trust and demonstrating their commitment to security.
